title: @Riot @KateyKhaos Do you let people know when you use their skin idea as inspiration?
body: I know you mentioned having a catalog of fan ideas, if you take inspiration for something, do you ever try to find the original artist and congratulate them or something? I don't mean to sound like, "You guys STOLE fan ideas" because I don't think that at all, but I mean I think it'd be nice to see the whole process behind that kind of thing! Thanks!
